ARABIC: قُلْ سِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'Travel about the earth and see the final fate of the evildoers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "Travel in the land and see how (bad) was the end of sinners."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say: "Go about through the earth and see what has been the end of the evil-doers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "Travel through the land and see how terrible was the end of the criminal ones".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Proclaim, (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “Travel in the land and see what sort of fate befell the guilty.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say to them: "Travel in the land and see how has been the end of the criminals."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Travel in the earth, then see how was the end of the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'Journey in the land, then behold how was the end of the sinners.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say (unto them, O Muhammad): Travel in the land and see the nature of the sequel for the guilty!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "Roam across the earth and observe what was the end of the sinful ones."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: travel in the land and behold what like hath been the end of the culprits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Travel over the land and observe how was the fate of the guilty.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "Go ye through the earth and see what has been the end of those guilty (of sin)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say to them (O Muhammad SAW) "Travel in the land and see how has been the end of the criminals (those who denied Allah's Messengers and disobeyed Allah)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'Journey in the land and see what was the end of the sinners'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, travel through the earth, and observe the fate of the guilty.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how was the end of the criminals."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:69] Say: ‘Travel in the land and see how was the sequel for the criminals’, because of their denials — and this [sequel] is that they were destroyed with punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Say) Muhammad, to the people of Mecca: (Travel in the land and see) and take admonition from (the nature of the sequel for the guilty) how was the end of the idolaters!
